name: VR Soccer Header
description:
VR Soccer Header - Lets dive into Soccer Ground with comfortable Virtual Reality Experience. Specially designed and developed for fans of Soccer and Football for enjoying virtually created 360 degree audience and ground with VR Headset.

Special sound effect and Awesome Design which energise your real Soccer game experience. Real Graphical effect that encourage you to feel high quality ball hitting effect which add more fun and make it very addictive.

With Virtual Reality you can able to create new relaxation experience like reality.

To play virtual reality football moves your VR headset to look up, down & round and make perfect soccer penalty kick to goal on your target. There are two mode to play, One is simple and the other is audience mode when you hit the target, Audience will appreciate your victory.

Feel Great virtual reality experience. No need of tutorial, text or buttons. Just use your head wear cardboard to shoot the ball towards the goal.
